Class GamePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • supermario.GamePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GamePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    GamePanel is place where the graphics of the game are drawn derives from JPanel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
